actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Telecommunications, Consumer Protection and Finance.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Telecommunications, Consumer Protection and Finance

official_title: A bill to provide a moratorium until January 1, 1985, on the use by the Federal Communications Commission of any random selection system for granting any license or construction permit for any cellular radio telecommunications service.

summary.text: Prohibits the Federal Communications Commission, between November 1, 1983, and January 1, 1985, from using any random selection system for granting any license or construction permit for any domestic public cellular radio telecommunications service. Voids any action taken after November 1, 1983, and before enactment of this Act that would have been unauthorized under this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide a moratorium until January 1, 1985, on the use by the Federal Communications Commission of any random selection system for granting any license or construction permit for any cellular radio telecommunications service.
